Tassadar.name: Plasma Shield
Tassadar.description: Grant a Shield that absorbs 475 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. Heroes gain 40% Life Steal from Basic Attacks while Shielded.

Tassadar.name: Psionic Storm
Tassadar.description: Deal 84 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds. Damage increases by 10% for each consecutive instance of damage.

Tassadar.name: Dimensional Shift
Tassadar.description: Tassadar becomes invulnerable and Unrevealable for 2 seconds. While shifted, he has 25% increased Movement Speed.

Tassadar.name: Archon
Tassadar.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 166 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 83 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds. Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

Tassadar.name: Force Wall
Tassadar.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.  Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

Tassadar.name: Oracle
Tassadar.description: Activate to greatly increase Tassadar's vision radius, allow him to see over obstacles, and detect stealthed units. Lasts for 5 seconds. Passive: Tassadar's Basic Attack is a Distortion Beam that slows enemy units by 20%.

1.name: Khaydarin Resonance
1.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 100% Mana.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 20%. Reward: After collecting 30 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 40%.

1.name: Psi-Infusion
1.description: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every Non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm. Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%. Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20%.

1.name: Templar's Will
1.description: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second. Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%. Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

4.name: Khala's Celerity
4.description: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

4.name: Khala's Embrace
4.description: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

4.name: Khala's Light
4.description: Upon expiration or breaking, the target of Plasma Shield gains 15 Armor for 3 seconds, causing them to take 15% less damage.

7.name: Mental Acuity
7.description: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

7.name: Psionic Projection
7.description: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

7.name: Resonation
7.description: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.

10.name: Archon
10.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 175 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 88 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds. Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

10.name: Force Wall
10.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.  Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

13.name: Adun's Wisdom
13.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 50% faster.

13.name: Deep Shift
13.description: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

13.name: Nullification
13.description: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals by 75% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Focused Beam
16.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Phase Disruption
16.description: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 25, causing them to take 25% more damage from Basic Attacks.

16.name: Psionic Echo
16.description: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2 seconds of casting the first.

20.name: Force Barrier
20.description: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

20.name: Prismatic Link
20.description: Basic Attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 50% damage.

20.name: Shield Battery
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

20.name: Twilight Archon
20.description: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.
